snippet: Family-owned companies are increasingly making philanthropy a cornerstone of their business model, making sure the family’s and the business’s core values are in step.
abstract: Family-owned companies are increasingly making philanthropy a cornerstone of their business model, making sure the family’s and the business’s core values are in step.
lead_paragraph: Family-owned companies are increasingly making philanthropy a cornerstone of their business model, making sure the family’s and the business’s core values are in step.

headline.seo: More Family Firms Make Philanthropy Their Business
